name: BedtimeSounds
0:
”Alexa, open Bedtime Sounds”
”Alexa, start Bedtime Sounds”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bedtime sounds
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Fall asleep faster and wake up more refreshed with Bedtime Sounds from Volley. 

Let us help you drift off to sleep while listening to our selection of relaxing music.

Immerse yourself in the natural soundscape of a rainforest or thunderstorm.

Relax with the warm tones of a crackling fire.

With several sound categories and new sounds on the way, there is a Bedtime Sound for everyone.

Available on all your Alexa devices.

HOW TO USE:
Get started by saying, "Alexa, open Bedtime Sounds."
Bedtime Sounds will play your selected story until you say "Alexa, stop." If you stop your sound and return to Bedtime Sounds later, you can continue where you left off.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
